  • Method Details

    • merge

      public void merge(Island island)
      This method merges two islands, keeping the current island. The current island's parameters will become the sum of the two islands parameters.
      Parameters:
      island - specifies the island to merge with the current island.

    • calculateInfluence

      public int calculateInfluence(Player player, Player[] professors, Player dominator)
      This method calculates the influence that the specified player has on the island.
      Parameters:
      player - specifies the player we want to calculate the influence.
      professors - specifies for each professor which player has that professor.
      dominator - specifies the player that is now dominating on the island.
      Returns:
      returns the value of influence for the specified player.

    • updateInfluence

      public void updateInfluence(List<Player> players, Player[] professors) throws EndGameException
      This method updates the island dominator.
      Parameters:
      players - specifies the list of players.
      professors - specifies for each professor which player has that professor.
      Throws:
      EndGameException

    • updateIslandDominatorAndTowerInfluence

      private void updateIslandDominatorAndTowerInfluence(List<Player> players, Player[] professors) throws EndGameException
      Throws:
      EndGameException

    • checkForTie

      private boolean checkForTie(int[] nonDominatorPlayersInfluences)

    • towerInfluence

      public void towerInfluence(Player newDominator) throws EndGameException
      This method updates the number of tower on the school boards of the players that are taking or losing the domination.
      Parameters:
      newDominator - specifies the player that is now dominating on the island.
      Throws:
      EndGameException - if a player has not any other towers.

    • addStudent

      public void addStudent(Color color)
      This method adds one student on the onto this island
      Parameters:
      color - specifies the color of the student that has to be added onto the island

    • getDominatorEvenIfNull

      public String getDominatorEvenIfNull()
      This method is useful to build the string that describes the island.
      Returns:
      the island dominator's username if present, '/' otherwise.
